attributes.action: introduce legislation to make medication packaging safer and cheaper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is too far easy to pop a tablet from a strip of medication and not notice you have also taken the small piece of foil that covered it, which either sticks at the back of the throat or gets swallowed. The empty strips are not recyclable, come with superfluous instructions for those using repeat medications, and overall the packaging must be needlessly expensive and a drain on the NHS.
